title: Mine and Caves - Low Poly Modular Assets
description: Unearth a world of wonder with our Low Poly Stylized Mine and Caves pack. From rocks and cave walls to tools and gems, create captivating underground landscapes in Unreal Engine. Unleash your creativity today!
longDescription:
Embark on a subterranean odyssey of creativity with our meticulously curated Low Poly Stylized Mine and Caves Asset Pack, exclusively designed for Unreal Engine. Within the depths of this digital trove, you'll unearth a treasure trove of elements crafted to help you construct immersive underground worlds that breathe with life and history.

Delve into the heart of the earth and shape your own labyrinthine tunnels and caverns, each corner whispering of untold tales and hidden wonders. With an assortment of meticulously crafted rocks and cave walls, you'll sculpt an environment that exudes authenticity and captivates the senses. Every crack, crevice, and texture has been carefully considered to transport your audience into the heart of your subterranean realm.

As you traverse the virtual depths, you'll encounter precious gems that glimmer like fragments of the cosmos trapped within the earth's embrace. These gems are not merely static objects; they are the focal points of stories waiting to be discovered. Whether your narrative revolves around mining endeavors or forgotten treasures, these gems add depth and purpose to your world.

Equipped with an array of tools including shovels, pickaxes, and hammers, you have the means to bring your mine to life with purpose and activity. These tools aren't just props; they are conduits through which players can immerse themselves in the experience of mining and excavation. Each strike of the pickaxe and swing of the hammer becomes a tangible gesture that resonates within your digital domain.

But a mine is more than just tools and gems—it's a complex network of passages and tracks. The pack offers a range of mine tracks, serving as conduits that lead adventurers deeper into the earth, guiding them through the twists and turns of your meticulously crafted environment. These tracks are the veins of your underground world, pulsing with the potential for exploration and adventure.

And amidst the darkness, delicate mushrooms flourish, casting a gentle glow that adds an otherworldly aura to the depths. Their soft luminescence invites players to tread carefully and explore the hidden corners of your subterranean masterpiece.

Whether you're constructing a narrative-driven experience, a mining simulation, or a fantastical underground realm, the Mine and Caves Asset Pack is your key to unlocking a realm of creative possibilities. Through the fusion of stylized aesthetics and Unreal Engine's power, you can shape a world that draws players in, encouraging them to lose themselves within the depths of your imagination. Embrace the challenge of bringing the underground to life, and watch as your creativity shines brighter than any gem within this digital mine.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  65 unique meshes.
  •  6 cave walls and ceilings (modular allow you to construct your own tunnel system)
  •  1 mine entrance
  • 8 gemstones
  • 1 beam
  • 3 planks
  • 2 boxes
  • 1 hammer
  • 1 pickaxe
  • 2 shovels
  • 2 lanterns
  • 2 mine carts
  • 4 mushrooms
  • 5 ore
  • 5 stalagmites
  • 16 rocks
  • 5 train tracks (modular allowing you to construct your own rail system)
  • 1 track stop
  • 1 cave wall support beam

Number of Unique Meshes: 65

Collision: Yes, automatic

Vertex Count: 13,794

LODs: No

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 10

Number of Textures: 0

Texture Resolutions: N/A

Supported Development Platforms: Tested on a Windows-64 system. As basic models this asset pack should work on all supported UE platforms.

Documentation: Simple static meshes that can be dragged and dropped into your scene.
